function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Need to re-imagine water systems and infrastructure to address climate change and potential outbreaks","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Energy requirements and potential for counterbalancing savings in water systems digitalization","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of standardised method for covid-19 measurements","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ethical dilemmas in public decision-making that conflict with public values in the context of managing water systems","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Tradeoff between public health and economic preservation in pandemic policymaking","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Influence of computational models on decision-making, leading to oversight of important real-world aspects","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of confidence in water services","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased personnel density in centralised infrastructure management","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of redundancy in centralised infrastructure","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inefficient collection of invoices and economic resources for water utility","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased automation and real-time remote control of critical water infrastructure","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential reliance on sewage tracking for disease severity assessment may overlook unrepresented cases in the community","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Digital technology extracting intimate health information from water and wastewater-related services","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Blurred boundaries between water services and public health","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of human wastewater to track diseases","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on sewage-based monitoring for disease detection","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Monitoring wastewater effluents from hospitals for virus spread","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased reliance on digital platforms for utility operations may result in data security and privacy risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 in wastewater raises concerns about potential transmission and public health risks through sewage epidemiology.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased revenue from water service leading to potential costly breakdowns and permanent closure of businesses or industries","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Safe working conditions and protective equipment required for water utility staff","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective conventional treatment for pharmaceutical compounds may lead to water contamination","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependence on the continuation of the risk of transmission for social distancing measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Extended urbanisation and informal public areas increase vulnerability to infectious diseases due to demographic factors, infrastructure, and governance.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Built environment can create conditions for the spread of specific diseases, such as legionnaire’s disease, through factors like air conditioning, indoor plumbing, and hot water systems.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapid spread of gastrointestinal problems and fevers associated with infectious diseases such as dysentery or typhoid among the legions or in military camps.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Transmission of the bubonic plague through trade routes, mainly via fleas carried by rats and other infected animals.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Globalization leading to increased movement of people and goods, and rapid dissemination of ideas, increasing the potential for transmission of infectious diseases.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urbanization altering the consequences of infectious diseases, with cities creating conditions for the growth and spread of new microorganisms.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High probability of individuals having a body temperature lower than 37.5  c","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of onsite electricity generation and storage units","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on wireless mesh network for data relay may result in data transmission delays or interruptions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of native python environment for processing sensor data and additional computing tasks may pose security vulnerabilities.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Spurious measurements in the data stream","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unreliable data transmission due to wpan collapse","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate error checking and data processing in ’calibration’ mode may result in inaccurate or incomplete measurements, impacting the accuracy of disease propagation monitoring","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Proprietary firmware for xbee module may pose security risks and vulnerabilities to the network.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Internationalisation of power supply may introduce compatibility issues and safety risks.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Plug-and-play installation may lead to overlooking safety and environmental factors.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Switching system architecture from arduino avr to arm cortex","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of inexpensive but accurate and readily available devices for high performance building applications","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Selection of sensor parameters based on nabers indoor environment rating scheme","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Enclosed array of sensors may compromise indoor air quality","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Intrusion of technology into immediate workspace","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of contamination if the sensor network is not properly sanitized or maintained, leading to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Complex ebbs and flows of air temperature and relative humidity within office buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unprecedented insight into commercial office building ieq performance through environmental monitoring and building operations","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Highly localised environmental sensors capable of monitoring individual occupant exposure","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Varied spatial and temporal distribution of indoor environmental parameters , air speed, air pollution concentrations increase the complexity of accurate ieq monitoring.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Presumed linearity in relationships between ieq factors","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"}]}
